summary: "National Lampoon's Animal House" is a 1978 comedy film about a wild fraternity at Faber College. Directed by John Landis and inspired by real-life fraternity experiences, it stars John Belushi and Tim Matheson. Filming took place at the University of Oregon. Despite mixed reviews, it became the highest-grossing comedy of its time, launching the "gross-out" film genre. The movie is now considered one of the best comedies ever, preserved in the National Film Registry and ranked high in various comedy lists.
title: Animal House
